txt.en: Abandoned axes gathered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Blades and Plows
You spot some abandoned tools
Gather abandoned shovels ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gather abandoned axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Hello, my friend. If you are willing I am in need of some help. When word of the assaults led by Bârshud II reached the people here in Burukíri some of my farm-hands fled the area with their families to find somewhere safer.

'I do not condemn their decisions, but in the chaos when they fled my farm-hands abandoned the tools they had in their hands. I need them back and accounted for. This is where you come in!

'If you have the time, I ask that you check around Burukíri for abandoned tools. The places that the farm-hands worked were behind the house, near the beehives, and around the mill. I would suggest checking there first.'
'My tools! Thank you my friend. I can now make sure the work is getting done in Burukíri, and the people here will be ready for the coming fight.'
Check around the mill for any abandoned tools
Abandoned shovels gathered ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gather abandoned axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

After news of the assaults led by Bârshud II reached Iridír many of Ashnân's farm-hands fled to seek a safer place for them and their families. In the chaos they abandoned their tools and Ashnân needs your help gathering them up.
You spotted some abandoned tools behind the house in Burukíri. Gather them so they can be returned to Ashnân.
You spot some abandoned tools
Return to Ashnân in Burukíri and give him the abandoned tools you were able to recover.
Ashnân needs your help gathering the tools abandoned by the farm-hands in Burukíri. He said to check by the beehives next.
Ashnân needs your help gathering the tools abandoned by the farm-hands in Burukíri. He suggested checking behind the house first.
